summary: The document is a restricted identification form related to the JFK assassination system, detailing an investigation into David Reed Fromer, a DOD-affiliated personnel incident. It includes checks with various local agencies which disclosed no records on the subject. The form was submitted on December 2, 1966, and was last reviewed on March 7, 1995, with some information released with deletions.
key_findings: Document pertains to the JFK assassination system and involves DOD-affiliated personnel.
Investigation into David Reed Fromer revealed no records from checked local agencies.
Form includes sensitive information marked as restricted and was released with deletions.
Submission date of the form is December 2, 1966, with a last review date of March 7, 1995.
